properties.NAME: BE Building
properties.DESC: Basic Education Building is a 4-storey building located near CHS Building. This building accommodates Junior High School (Grade 7-10) and Senior High School Students (Grade 11-12) students.
properties.DESC_POI: Office of the JHS/SHS Director, Basic Education Library

properties.NAME: CHS Building
properties.DESC: College of Health and Sciences Building is a 3-storey building located in-between UPang Gymnasium (left) and BE Building (right). This building accommodate students from CHS Department.
properties.DESC_POI: Mock Hospital, College of Health Sciences, Culinary Arts Laboratory, Amphitheater

properties.NAME: UPang Gymnasium
properties.DESC: UPang Gymnasium is located in-between CHS Building (right) and Faculty Center (left). Events such as sports, mass, etc. are usually held in here. Physical Education classes are usually conducted in this building.
properties.DESC_POI: General Services Department Office (GSD), Security Office, Travel Tour Simulation Room, Medical and Dental Clinic, Printing Room, NROTC Office

properties.NAME: Faculty Center
properties.DESC: Faculty Center is a 4-storey building located near UPang Gymanasium.
properties.DESC_POI: Engineering Laboratory, Crime Laboratory, College of Social Sciences Office (CSS), College of Management and Accountancy Office (CMA), Media and Learning Resource Room, College of Arts and Sciences (CAS)

properties.NAME: Engineering Building
properties.DESC: Engineering building is a 3-storey building located in-between Faculty Center (right) and MBA Building (left). This building accommodate Engineering and Architecture Students.
properties.DESC_POI: College of Engineering and Architecture Office (CEA)

properties.NAME: PTC Building
properties.DESC: Pangasinan Technological Center is 4-storey building. This building accommodates IT students and Law students.
properties.DESC_POI: University of Pangasinan Faculty Union Office (UPFU), Mac Lab, College of Information and Technology Education Office (CITE), College of Law Office, College of Law Library

properties.NAME: ITS Building
properties.DESC: Information Technology Services is a 2-storey building located near PTC Building.
properties.DESC_POI: Center for Student Development and Leadership (CSDL), Information Technology Services Office

properties.NAME: Administration Building
properties.DESC: Administration Building is a 2-storey building located near PTC Building. You can find here the former President Fidel V. Ramos collection of books and memorabilia that shows a glimpse of his life.
properties.DESC_POI: Office of the Registrar, Office of the Comptroller / Finance, Library, FVR Museum, Marketing Office, University Research Committee Office, PEN Research Director's Office, Office of the President / EVP COO

properties.NAME: Student Plaza
properties.DESC: Student Plaza is located near Administration Building and Forest Area. This is the place where students take rest, buy food, and hang out with their friends.

properties.NAME: MBA Building
properties.DESC: MBA Building is a 5-storey building located in-between CEA Building (right) and NH Building (left). This building was named after the Vice Chairman of Philippine Investment Management (PHINMA) Inc. Dr. Magdaleno Albaraccin Jr.
properties.DESC_POI: Office of Graduate Studies, University Canteen, Human Resource Department (HRD), University Chapel, Employees Lounge, Audio Visual Room (AVR), Science Laboratories

properties.NAME: Store Area
properties.DESC: This area offers different kinds of services, from selling school supplies, printing or xerox services, and many more.

properties.NAME: CMA Building
properties.DESC: College of Management and Accountancy Building is a 4-storey building located near NH Building. This building accommodate CMA students.
properties.DESC_POI: College of Management and Accountancy Office (CMA)

properties.NAME: NH Building
properties.DESC: North Hall Building is a 4-storey building located near MBA Building (right) and CMA Building (left).
